title: S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) Price Target Update
text:
by Jeff Simonsen August 14, 2015 
S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA): 3 Analyst have given the stock of S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) a near short term price target of $31.67. The standard deviation reading, which is a measure by which the stock price is expected to swing away from the mean estimate, is at $0.58. The higher price target estimate is at $32 while the lower price estimates are fixed at $31. 
Many analysts have commented on the company rating. Keefe Bruyette & Woods maintains its rating on S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA). The global brokerage major raises the current price target from $31 per share to $33 per share. Analysts at the Keefe Bruyette & Woods have a current rating of Outperform on the shares. The rating by the firm was issued on July 22, 2015. 
As many as 5 brokerage firms have rated S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) at 2.8. Research Analysts at Zacks have ranked the company at 2, suggesting the traders with a rating of buy for the short term. The stock garnered a place in the hold list of 4 stock Analysts. 1 analysts suggested buying the company. 
Currently the company Insiders own 3% of S&T Bancorp Inc. Company shares. In the past six months, there is a change of -12.96% in the total insider ownership. Institutional Investors own 45.8% of Company shares. During last 3 month period, -0.46% of total institutional ownership has changed in the company shares. 
On a different note, The Company has disclosed insider buying and selling activities to the Securities Exchange, The Securities and Exchange Commission has divulged that Gibson James Thomas, director of S&T Bancorp Inc, had unloaded 25,000 shares at an average price of $31.3 in a transaction dated on July 24, 2015. The total value of the transaction was worth $782,500. 
Shares of S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) ended Thursday session in red amid volatile trading. The shares closed down 0.16 points or 0.53% at $30.15 with 156,320 shares getting traded. Post opening the session at $30.38, the shares hit an intraday low of $29.97 and an intraday high of $30.6 and the price vacillated in this range throughout the day. The company has a market cap of $1,050 million and the number of outstanding shares have been calculated to be 34,812,000 shares. The 52-week high of S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) is $32.88 and the 52-week low is $23.07. 
S&T Bancorp Inc. has lost 1.5% in the last five trading days and dropped 2.17% in the last 4 weeks. S&T Bancorp Inc. is up 12.07% in the last 3-month period. Year-to-Date the stock performance stands at 3.08%.
